head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BROWN, ANNIE ELIZABETH (NEE SYKES)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BROWN, ANNIE ELIZABETH (NEE SYKES)

block.p: BROWN-Annie Elizabeth (nee Sykes). Formerly of Sheepshead Bay, departed this life on May 29, 2000 at Scarsdale, NY. Beloved wife of the late Rev J.S. Brown. Devoted sister of Rachel Sykes. Loving mother of Diane Brown, Jane Holden, Janice Cheek and Joan Adams. Cherished grandmother of McThaddeus Holden, Jr., Anthony Holden, James Brown III, James Cheek, Jr., David Cheek, Annie Adams and Peter Adams II. Adoring great grandmother of Justin Holden, James Cheek III and Diamond JonesCheek. Friends may visit on Friday, June 2, at First Baptist Church of Sheepshead Bay, 2349 East 15th Street, Brooklyn, from 3-7PM. Funeral services will follow at 7PM. Entombment will be at Evergreen Cemetery, Brooklyn, on Saturday, June 3, at 10:00 AM.
